about_the_game:
Get an exclusive bundle of gear to help kickstart your adventure! This bundle also includes resources to upgrade your new gear!

The Golden Flame Gear Bundle Includes:

  • 1 Epic Accessory (Flame Ring)
  • 1 Rare Armor (Golden Grasp)
  • 600 Accessory Shards
  • 600 Armor Shards
  • 5000 Gold

Please note: The contents of this DLC bundle are not tradeable or refundable.
